definition: A period of time during which students undergo evaluations and assessments, typically at the end of a semester or academic term, to determine their level of knowledge and understanding in a particular subject or course.

examples.english: The exam period starts next week.

examples.german: Während der Prüfungsphase müssen wir viel lernen.
examples.english: During the exam period, we have to study a lot.
The exam period lasts two weeks.

examples.german: In der Prüfungsphase sind die Bibliotheken länger geöffnet.
examples.english: During the exam period, the libraries have longer opening hours.

examples.german: Die Prüfungsphase ist eine stressige Zeit für die Studierenden.
examples.english: The exam period is a stressful time for students.
